name: Pole Cats (Jc Statt)
description:
Face off with a friend in the race to connect the West! Race back and forth connecting the East and West to score big points! But beware: your competitor can snip your lines if they're below the middle of your wire, shutting off the flow of telegrams and points. When the time runs out, see who's the best wire-wrangler in town!

This game was made through Pixel Pushers Auxiliary for Global Game Jam 2018's "transmission" theme.

Art- Ted Anderson

Code/Sound- Jc Statt

Music by Bruno Bassi via GoSoundtrack.com

FX from zapsplat.com
